title: Adidas Cuts Ties With Kanye West
description: The sportswear brand calculates it will incur a $246 million cost for its decision to terminate its partnership with the hip-hop mogul.
dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Ravi Mattu, Bernhard Warner, Vivian Giang, Sarah Kessler, Stephen Gandel, Michael J. de la Merced, Lauren Hirsch and Ephrat Livni
